articles.title: Parts of Morrissey Blvd. may close this week due to high tide flooding
articles.description:
The closures may occur from Tuesday through Sunday.

The post Parts of Morrissey Blvd. may close this week due to high tide flooding appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Morrissey Blvd. may close from Tuesday to Sunday due to high tide flooding.
Closures affect local traffic and access for Boston residents and businesses.
Residents should plan alternate routes to avoid delays this week.

articles.title: Diane Ladd, 3-time Oscar nominee, dies at 89
articles.description:
A gifted comic and dramatic performer, Ladd had a long career in television and on stage before breaking through as a film performer in Martin Scorsese’s 1974 release “Alice Doesn’t Live Here Anymore.”

The post Diane Ladd, 3-time Oscar nominee, dies at 89 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Diane Ladd, renowned actress, passed away at age 89 on November 4, 2025.
Ladd was a three-time Oscar nominee, known for her role in 'Alice Doesn’t Live Here Anymore.'
Her death marks a significant loss for Boston's arts community and local theater scene.

articles.title: Worker dies after 11 hours trapped within partially collapsed medieval tower in Rome
articles.description:
Another Romanian was successfully removed and is out of danger, the statement said.

The post Worker dies after 11 hours trapped within partially collapsed medieval tower in Rome appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: A worker died after being trapped for 11 hours in Rome's medieval tower.
Another Romanian worker was rescued and is currently out of danger.
This incident raises safety concerns for Boston construction workers abroad.
